result.arabic_text: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِي لِذَنۢبِكِۖ إِنَّكِ كُنتِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَاطِـِٔينَ
result.translation: Yaciye ahindukira abwira Yusufu ati: “Yusu! Irengagize ivyabaye umbikire akabanga, ntihagire n’umwe uzovyiganira”. Aca agaruka kuri nya mugore amuhanura ati: “Saba ikigongwe ku caha cawe, mu vy’ukuri uri mu bantu bakosheje mu kwambika ibara Yusufu”.
